properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 6:20AM CST until January 17 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...Light freezing rain likely across parts of northeast Arkansas
and the Missouri Bootheel early this morning...

* WHAT...Light freezing rain and some sleet expected. Elevated
surfaces such as bridges may become slick.

* WHERE...Craighead County.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning.

* IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the morning
commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING
